segments.text: What's that book you have under your arm ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's the best seller everyone's been talking about for the last six months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How in the world did you get a copy ? I've put a hold on it at the public library for weeks and I'm still waiting my turn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I checked it out of the rental library . It only costs five cents a day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it really worth paying for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't tell yet . I haven't got beyond the first chapter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If it's any good , I'll buy a copy when it comes out in the pocket edition .
segments.speaker: S1
